title: Plugin Metadata
description: Describes a client plugin in Matrix

id.description: Unique identifier of the plugin, should be in reverse fqdn notation (com.matrixreq.plugin.example). This needs to have at least 2 segments (plugin -> invalid, my.plugin -> valid)

matrixVersion.description: The versions of Matrix this plugin is compatible with. Uses semver format (https://devhints.io/semver)

name.description: The display name of the plugin

src.description: The source of the plugin (Github repo, SVN repo etc)

oops.description: The location of the plugin in OOPS

test.description: Link to a document describing how the plugin was tested
